snippet: The biggest opponent to Detroit’s blueprint for rising out of bankruptcy has reached an agreement with the city, court documents show, prompting an adjournment in a trial over the city’s plan.
abstract: Syncora Guarantee reaches agreement in principle with Detroit officials, clearing way to end city's court fight over its future and emerge from bankruptcy far more quickly and smoothly than expected; Syncora had been fiercest opponent to city's blueprint for erasing its debts and investing in city services.

byline.original: By MARY WILLIAMS WALSH and MONICA DAVEY

lead_paragraph: The biggest opponent to Detroit’s blueprint for rising out of bankruptcy has reached an agreement with the city, court documents show, prompting an adjournment in a trial over the city’s plan.

headline.main: Detroit Clears Crucial Hurdle on Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Detroit Clears Crucial Hurdle on Bankruptcy
